summary: Build a multi-page marketing website for "Predicta Healthcare" (healthcare products focused on ICU/OT setup and hospital furniture), using the logo and matching its colors, and displaying provided contact details.
architectural_notes: Website should use the provided logo and match its color palette across the UI.
Include contact details prominently (phone, email, address) on relevant pages (e.g., header/footer and Contact section).
User confirmed the site should be a multi-page website (Home, Products/Categories, About, Contact) rather than a single-page layout.
ICU Setup content should include a representative photo plus a structured list of equipment, furniture, and ICU wall/construction requirements.
OT Setup content should include an image plus a short structured list of key items (AHU as per customer requirement, ducting wall, OT light, OT table).
known_issues: Logo file not actually provided in the conversation thread; needed to extract colors and use in the website.
ICU Setup photo asset was referenced as 'attached' but is not available in the project conversation/thread yet.
OT Setup image asset referenced as 'this image' but not available in the project conversation/thread yet.
Build/deploy is currently blocked by internal/system configuration errors encountered during attempted rebuilds.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hospital bed in a clean patient room with side rails and bedside table (hospital-furniture-bedroom.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Clinical examination room with an examination table and storage cabinets (hospital-furniture-exam-room.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Medical trolley/cart and modular storage furniture in a hospital corridor setting (hospital-furniture-medical-cart.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Modern laboratory bench with instruments, shelves, and organized glassware (laboratory-setup-bench.dim_1200x800.jpg)
- Close-up of diagnostic lab analyzer equipment in a bright lab environment (laboratory-setup-analyzer.dim_1200x800.jpg)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for the brand name "Predicta Healthcare" focused on healthcare products, especially ICU/OT setup and hospital furniture.
Add core pages/sections suitable for a small healthcare products company: Home, Products/Categories, About, and Contact; ensure navigation links work and clearly indicate the current section.

Use the provided logo (when available) as the site logo and match the site color palette to the logo colors; until the logo file is available in the project, implement the palette via a centralized theme configuration so replacing the logo later updates branding with minimal code change.
Display the provided contact details prominently on the Contact page/section and in the site footer: Phone: 7016390948; Email: predictahealthcare@gmail.com; Address: Nikol, Ahmedabad - 382350.

Create a coherent, professional visual theme appropriate for healthcare equipment and hospital infrastructure (avoid blue/purple unless the logo requires it), applying consistent typography, spacing, and component styling across all pages.
Add a Products/Categories section that highlights at least these categories with short descriptions: ICU Setup, OT Setup, Hospital Furniture; include a simple, clean card/grid layout.
Add static marketing content on the Home page: a hero section with a headline, subheadline, and primary call-to-action button that links to the Contact section/page.
Add generated static images to the project and render them from the frontend as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images from the backend).
Convert the current single-page, scroll-based layout into a true multi-page website with separate routes/pages for Home, Products, About, and Contact.

Update the site navigation (Header and Footer) to use route navigation between pages (instead of scrolling to on-page section IDs), and clearly indicate the currently active page in the navigation UI on both desktop and mobile.
Update in-page calls-to-action that currently scroll to sections so they work correctly in a multi-page setup (e.g., the Hero "Get Started" action should navigate to the Contact page).
Add a new product category named "Laboratory Setup" to the product categories list so it appears alongside ICU Setup, OT Setup, and Hospital Furniture on the Products page.
Add a new static icon image asset for the "Laboratory Setup" category and reference it from the category data.
Add the user-uploaded ICU photo to the project as a static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, and reference it from the ICU Setup content.

Update the Products page UI so the ICU Setup category displays the added ICU photo in addition to its existing icon/title/description (without breaking the layout for OT Setup, Hospital Furniture, and Laboratory Setup).
Add an ICU Setup details section on the Products page that lists ICU requirements grouped into three headings: Equipment, Furniture, and Wall/Construction (English text).

Add the user-uploaded OT Setup photo (1000795149.jpg) to the project as a static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, and reference it from the OT Setup category so it displays as the category photo in the Products grid (similar to ICU Setup).

Add an OT Setup details section on the Products page that lists the OT requirements as a short English bullet list containing: “AHU as per customer requirement”, “Ducting wall”, “OT light”, and “OT table”.
Update the Laboratory Setup category data so the Laboratory Setup card displays the uploaded laboratory image (images.jpeg) as its category photo, with appropriate English alt text.

Add multiple new static image assets for the Hospital Furniture category and the Laboratory Setup category under frontend/public/assets/generated, and ensure each image has appropriate English alt text available for rendering in the UI.

Update the product categories data so the Hospital Furniture category card displays a photo (similar to ICU Setup, OT Setup, and Laboratory Setup), using one of the newly added Hospital Furniture images and a descriptive English alt text.

Add dedicated sections on the Products page for Hospital Furniture and for Laboratory Setup that each display a small responsive gallery (multiple images) using the newly added static assets, keeping styling consistent with existing ICU/OT detail sections and ensuring the layout works on mobile and desktop.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create "Predicta Healthcare" website for healthcare products (ICU/OT setup, hospital furniture) using logo-based color theme and showing contact details.
Add "Laboratory Setup" as an additional category under the Products/Categories list (alongside ICU Setup, OT Setup, Hospital Furniture).
Add the user-provided/attached photo to the ICU Setup category/section (e.g., on the Products page/category detail for ICU Setup).
Add an ICU Setup details list describing required items: equipment, furniture, and wall/construction requirements for ICU setup.
Add the provided/attached image to the OT Setup section/category (e.g., on the Products page).
Add an OT Setup details list/mention including: AHU as per customer requirement, ducting wall, OT light, and OT table.
Add the same provided image to the Hospital Furniture section and include a list of required hospital furniture (specifically including beds).
Add the provided image to the Laboratory Setup section/category (e.g., on the Products page/category detail).
Add the user-uploaded images (1000795151.jpg and images.jpeg) to the frontend as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/ without serving them from the backend.
Add multiple images to the Hospital Furniture section(s) and the Laboratory Setup section (beyond the single category photo), e.g., additional section images/gallery content.
